topics.body:
There's a store I go to probably almost once a week
There's a guy who works there
Whenever I see him he's stocking the shelves

I feel like every time I see him I accidentally do something to annoy him. Like today I was pulling this box out to look at the back and I knocked a bunch of shit off the shelf by accident and he looked at me like I just ate his dog or something. 
Then this one time I put this thing back on the shelf that I decided not to buy and as I left I heard him let out the loudest sigh I've ever heard and I have no idea what I did.
topics.author: 500b587e7f123b1f230014a9

topics.body: You go Mimi!
